Description

The best, most realistic smartphone FPS series returns with even higher intensity and an apocalyptic battle for the freedom of the United States, for one or more players.

--------------------------                                                           WHATS NEW IN in Version 1.3.0
=============================
The Team Manhunt Update for Modern Combat 3: Fallen Nation is here!

2 New Multiplayer Maps:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Warehouse: This map, from Modern Combat 2, is back by popular demand!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Rapture: A village showdown in the middle of the jungle!

New Multiplayer Mode: 
Team Manhunt - Capture the flag with your team and keep it from your opponents as long as you can to earn points.

New Skill: 
Sneak up on the opposition with Stealth, which reduces the sounds of your footsteps.

New Piece of Equipment: 
The Shield has got your back! It reduces damage taken from behind.

Minor Bug Fixes
